p.s: The political speech held by the politician Boris Johnson at COP27 World Leaders Summit Opening Ceremony is deliveredwas delivered on 1 November of 2021.
Johnson adresses only a small group of leaders who have a big power and deals with the dangers of the climate crisis.
Johnson is aware that climate change is a big of a problem which needs to be solved.
He thinks that industralized countries have created the climate crisis and that the problem is clearly man-made.
Therefore a few agreements were made but in his opinion only the COP26 will change something and be a turning point in the history of climate change.
But this agreement should not be the end because it is no long-term solution.
Johnson delivers that we should focus on economy and that we need to spend much money to safesave our planet.
Otherwise the next generations will judge and blame us, so we have to act now.
The best first step will be the COP26 and the best way is to work together and help certain countries to develop.
In his opinion the COP26 has a big importance for the future and is essential.
